sentences.english: Here, we select some transients as the inputs of the parallel subnetworks.
sentences.chinese: 选用筛选后的暂态特征量作为各BP子网的输入。

sentences.english: Systematic study of the RC circuit and the RL circuit transient process.
sentences.chinese: 系统的研究了RC电路和RL电路的暂态过程。

sentences.english: The author studied the transient process of a full-wave bridge rectified filter when it was switched on in the circuit.
sentences.chinese: 研究了全波桥式整流滤波器接入电路时的暂态过程。

sentences.english: The quadrant glitches were due to friction brought about transient phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 象限误差主要是因为摩擦力带来的暂态现象。

sentences.english: The deviation of rotating speed from the integral of transient power is very close to the actual value.
sentences.chinese: 由暂态功率积分得到转速差，结果与实际值十分接近。

sentences.english: The implementation of a national network makes real-time electromechanical transient simulation become more difficult.
sentences.chinese: 全国联网的实现使得机电暂态实时仿真变得更加困难。

sentences.english: The three - factor method can simplify the analysis of the transient state of first - order alternating current linear circuit.
sentences.chinese: 三要素法可以简化一阶交流线性电路暂态分析。

sentences.english: It also proposes that the transient process of the system is a variable structure control problem.
sentences.chinese: 指出分层切负荷情况下的系统暂态过程是变结构问题。

sentences.english: Fast valving is one of the important methods to improve system transient stability.
sentences.chinese: 汽门快关是提高系统暂态稳定的有力措施之一。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the temporary state process of the direct-current tractive motor is analysed.
sentences.chinese: 同时，对直流牵引电动机的暂态过程进行了分析。

sentences.english: Large disturbances are the main threats to transient security of power systems.
sentences.chinese: 电力系统的暂态安全问题主要是由大扰动引起的。

definition: harmonic (wave with frequency an integer multiple of the fundamental)
filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
